parameters.name: ContainerType
parameters.description: The type of the container. Set the value to singularity.

parameters.name: ImageTag
parameters.description:
The tags of the image.

The repository stores a type of images such as Ubuntu images. Tags are used to identify the images. Examples: 16.04, 17.04, and latest.

Default value: latest

parameters.name: Name
parameters.description: The name of the container. The name must be 2 to 64 characters in length. It must start with a letter and can contain letters, digits, hyphens (-), and underscores (\_).

parameters.name: Repository
parameters.description:
The name of the repository. The image that has the same name as the repository is pulled.

For information about image names, visit [Docker Hub official website](https://hub.docker.com/search?q=\&type=image).
